data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Mangalam Global Enterprise Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from October 29, 2024, the equity shares of Mangalam Global Enterprise Ltd  (Scrip Code: 544273) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of ''B'' Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20241024-8 dated October 24, 2024.
